sentence: 4 |||  ||| 0.4 ||| Sample A total of 1483 women in active labour with singleton term fetus in cephalic presentation.
label: po.Size

sentence: 1 |||  ||| 0.1 ||| Objective To examine whether intrapartum monitoring by means of automatic ST analysis (STAN) of fetal electrocardiography could reduce the rate of neonatal acidemia and the rate of operative intervention during labour, compared with monitoring by means of cardiotocography (CTG).
content: whether intrapartum monitoring by means of automatic ST analysis (STAN) of fetal electrocardiography could reduce the rate of neonatal acidemia and the rate of operative intervention during labour
label: pr.Disease

sentence: 23 ||| Methods ||| 2.3 ||| The participants were consecutive women in active labour with term ( ‡36 + 0 gestational weeks) pregnancy, having a singleton fetus in a cephalic presentation and among whom amniotomy had been decided.
content: women in active labour with term
label: po.Disease

sentence: 8 |||  ||| 0.8 ||| Methods Women were randomly assigned to be monitored either by STAN or by CTG.
content: Women were randomly assigned to be monitored either by STAN or by CTG.
label: i.Procedure

sentence: 17 ||| Introduction ||| 1.2 ||| Intermittent fetal blood sampling (FBS) for pH determination during periods of nonreassuring CTG has been used as a complementary method to improve specificity.
content: Intermittent fetal blood sampling (FBS) for pH determination
label: i.Diagnostic

sentence: 41 ||| Methods ||| 2.21 ||| Power analysis calculated using Stata 7.0 software (Stata Corp LP, Bryan/College Station, TX, USA) to show a 50% reduction in the incidence of neonatal acidemia indicated a sample size of 761 per arm (a = 0.05, b = 0.20).
label: i.Diagnostic

sentence: 34 ||| Methods ||| 2.14 ||| If scalp blood pH was <7.20, immediate delivery was recommended according to our current labour ward protocol.
content: If scalp blood pH was <7.20, immediate delivery was recommended according to our current labour ward protocol
label: o.Patient

sentence: 57 ||| Results ||| 3.14 ||| When considering a pH value lower than 7.10 as a criterion of neonatal acidemia, there was no difference between the groups.
content: there was no difference between the groups.
label: o.Treatment
